name: meep
description:
Meep (or MEEP) is a free finite-difference time-domain (FDTD) simulation
software package developed at MIT to model electromagnetic systems.

dependencies.name: harminv
dependencies.description:
Harminv is a free program (and accompanying library) to solve the
problem of harmonic inversion - given a discrete-time, finite-length
signal that consists of a sum of finitely-many sinusoids (possibly
exponentially decaying) in a given bandwidth, it determines the
frequencies, decay constants, amplitudes, and phases of those sinusoids.

dependencies.name: guile
dependencies.description:
Guile is the GNU Ubiquitous Intelligent Language for Extensions, the
official extension language for the GNU operating system.

dependencies.name: libctl
dependencies.description:
libctl is a free Guile-based library implementing flexible control files
for scientific simulations.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description: Fujitsu MPI implementation only for Fujitsu compiler.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: gsl
dependencies.description:
The GNU Scientific Library (GSL) is a numerical library for C and C++
programmers. It is free software under the GNU General Public License.
The library provides a wide range of mathematical routines such as
random number generators, special functions and least-squares fitting.
There are over 1000 functions in total with an extensive test suite.

dependent_to.name: py-python-meep
dependent_to.description:
Python-meep is a wrapper around libmeep. It allows the scripting of
Meep-simulations with Python
